jobTitle: Registered Nurse - Labor & Delivery Perinatal Float Pool - 36 Hours Nights with Every Other Weekend (SEIU)
jobDescription: Registered Nurse  Labor & Delivery Perinatal Float Pool  Status: Full Time 36 Hours  Shift: Nights, With Every Other Weekend  Union: SEIU  The Registered Nurse adheres to the rules and regulations of the Massachusetts Board of Registration in Nursing and is primarily responsible for professional performance and direct patient care. The role encompasses nursing assessment, diagnosis, planning, intervention, evaluation, and coordination of care for patients and their families across the health care continuum. Females, minorities, veterans, and persons with disabilities are strongly encouraged to apply.
